snippet.title: 🌸  Wylde Flowers 🌸 | First Look Trailer
snippet.description:
Here’s the first taste of our new game: Wylde Flowers  🌸

Join Tara on a heartfelt journey to become a witch in Wylde Flowers. Farm by day, and cast spells by night as you craft your cottagecore life and bond with your coven. Come to know and love the fully voice-acted characters of Fairhaven, as you unravel a local mystery.

It's perfect for folks that love:
📚 Heartfelt story games
💖 Cozy life & farming sims
🔮 Witches, broomsticks & magic spells
🌈 Charming worlds & diverse people

✨ Wishlist now on Steam ✨
https://bit.ly/WyldeFlowersSteam

🍎 Play now on Apple Arcade 🍎
https://apple.co/-WyldeFlowers

💖 Follow us on TikTok 💖
https://www.tiktok.com/@wyldeflowers

💌 Join our mailing list to keep updated! 💌
https://bit.ly/WyldeFlowersMailingList

🍃 Developed by: Studio Drydock 🍃
https://studiodrydock.com/
